style.css:
@-moz-document url-prefix('http://www.yomiuri.co.jp/') {
body > div#d2-article > div#d1-news,
body > div#d2-article > table.layout > tbody > tr > td.main > div.article-def > div#sbtns,
body > div#d2-article > table.layout > tbody > tr > td.main > div.article-def > div#gohome,
body > div#d2-article > table.layout > tbody > tr > td.main > div#nwrelatedarticles_list5,
body > div#d2-article > table.layout > tbody > tr > td.main > div.hd-def2,
body > div#d2-article > table.layout > tbody > tr > td.main > div.cont-news,
body > div#d2-article > table.layout > tbody > tr > td.main > table.ref-list,
body > div#d2-article > table.layout > tbody > tr > td.main > div.nav-bread2,
body > div#d2-article > table.layout > tbody > tr > td.main > div.main-eyc2,
body > div#d2-article > table.layout > tbody > tr > td.main:after,
body > div#d2-article > table.layout > tbody > tr > td.nav-r,
body > div#d2-article > table.nav-footer,
body > div#d2-article > div.align-c
{
  display: none;
}
}
